subject: Hi i have tried all the simsonn manager software versions 6 to 8 but it keeps saying the Pro x pedals are disconected which definatley not as they are lit up. In game the pressure levels are set to 50 for both throttle and brake so i cant get cars to move

conversations.body_text: Hi Barry Geddes,  I’ve sent you the prox.sfu file via email. Please save the attachment to your desktop. Then, press the upgrade button on your ProX control box, and reconnect the USB cable. The device will enter recovery mode. Next, open SIMSONN Manager 2.0.8, and go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → Pedals, then select the prox.sfu file you just saved on your desktop to proceed with the upgrade.
Thank you very much the problem is fixed
